card.name: City Streets
card.property: Surging Sands - Special: Place 1 sand counter here. Discard cards from the top of the encouter deck equal to the number of sand counters here. Hero Action: Exhauts a character you control -> remove sand counters from here equal to that character's ATK. (Limit once per round per player).

card.name: Sand Clone
card.property: X is equal to the number of sand counters on City Streets. When defeated: Resolve the "Surging Sands" ability on City Streets.

card.name: Sandslide
card.property: When revealed: Place 2 sand counters on City Streets, then resolve its "Surging Sands" ability. If at least 1 Sandman card was discarded this way, you are stunned.

card.name: Bell Tower
card.property: If there are at least 3[per_player] chime counters here, flip this card.

alternate.name: Bell Tower
alternate.property: Increase all damage Venom takes by 1. If there are no chime counters here, flip this card.

card.name: "Now We're Angry!"
card.property: Attach to Venom. Uses (2 rage counters).

card.name: For Whom the Bell Tolls
card.property: When revealed: Remove 2 chime counters from the Bell Tower.

card.name: Concussive Bombs
card.property: Attach to the villain. Uses (2 bomb counters).

card.name: Incendiary Bombs
card.property: Attach to the villain. Uses (2 bomb counters).

card.name: Smoke Bombs
card.property: Attach to the villain. Uses (2 bomb counters).
